author: nero_eth
content:
I've summarized the blob base fee mechanism changes we discussed in yesterday's [ACDC 146](https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/1200) in [this PR to EIP 7762](https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/9062). As proposed in the call it might make most sense to ship the blob target/max increase separate from everything touching the base fee mechanism and just manually update the blob base fee update fraction (like Ansgar did in [this PR](https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/9060)).

Also as said on ACD, I put 7623 on the agenda of the next ACDE next week. Hope we find consensus to ship it, as it's important for de-risking the blob throughput increase and, very generally, limit worst case bandwidth limits.
